name: Star Quest VR
description:
The Project

hi, this my first game ever, and its in VR  only for Oculus Quest !!
On April 2020 i have started to make a VR game with Unity to learn game developpement. i will post a new release each week with new content or bug fix. Your feedback, ideas or advices are really important to me. it motivate me to continue the developpement of the game. So leave me many comments.

Instructions

You are in a training room for practicing your shooting skill. 
- You have 3 life
- Shooting a blue cube give you points 
- Getting touch by a red cube you lose one life.
Do the best score you can !  (more mode to come soon).

Features in progress 

- Mode standard with two gun an color system
- Combo system 
- Time system
